section1.title: Eco-friendly lightweight brick
section1.subtitle: As a pioneer of eco-friendly light brick, Blesscon has been certified Green Label Indonesia, which means Blesscon light brick :

excellence.title: Economical
excellence.desc: Save materials, labor, time, and more efficient so that the construction costs are lower

excellence.title: Save Time
excellence.desc: Installation is 3x faster than red brick

excellence.title: Fire Resistant
excellence.desc: Resists fire up to 4 hours longer than conventional bricks

excellence.title: Lighter
excellence.desc: Up to 70% lighter building load with the same area

excellence.title: Environmentally Friendly
excellence.desc: Does not contain harmful heavy metals that may harm health

excellence.title: Tham Earthquake
excellence.desc: Maintain the structure of the building in the event of severe shaking

section3.title: Total pcs/m3
section3.iso: Blesscon lightweight bricks have been manufactured according to the ISO 9001:2015 standard

section4.title: Physical Specifications
section4.sni: The level of fire resistance meets the standard (TKA) -/240/240/240 according to SNI 1739-2008
